column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: mebɛyɛ Israel mbusuakuw no nyina hɔn Nyankopɔn
column5: na hɔn so wɔayɛ me man."

column3: Ɔman a afona daan hɔn gyae no
column4: enya adom wɔ sar no do; mekyerɛ Israel
column5: ber a memaa onyaa ahomgye no a."

column3: dɛ
column4: Ampaara
column5: madɔ wo ɔdomankoma dɔ: dɛm ntsi na medze adɔyɛ atwe wo no."

column3: na esi hɔ
column4: Ao Israel ɔbaabun: edze wo mpintsin bɛgyegye w’enyi bio
column5: na epue wɔ agofo asaw mu."

column2: "Ebɛtsetsɛw wenyin nture wɔ Samaria mbepɔw do bio: atsetsɛwfo bɛtsetsɛw
column3: na woedzi n’aba bi."

column2: "Na da bi bɛba a aweɔmfo bɛtsea mu wɔ Efraim mbepɔw do
column3: dɛ
column4: Hom nsoɛr ma yɛmfow nkɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn wɔ Zion."

column3: Hom mfa enyigye ntow ndwom wɔ Jakob ho
column4: na hom mbɔ amanaman etsitsir ho ose: hom mfa ntahye

column3: medze hɔn fi kwaamu afamu asaase do mebɛba
column4: na makɔboa hɔn ano efi asaase ano noho
column6: ɔpemfo na ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo nyina ka ho bi: okuw kukuankoma na wɔbɛsan aba ha."

column3: na nkotoserɛ na medze bɛgye hom nkwa: mebɛma wɔanantsew esutsen ho
column4: wɔ ɔkwan tsenee mu a worimmfintsiw: na meyɛ egya ma Israel

column3: hom ntsie EWURADZE n’asɛm
column4: na hom nka wɔ esupruw a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir no mu; dɛ
column8: dɛ mbrɛ oguanhwɛfo hwɛ no nguankuw do no."

column3: na ɔapon no efi nyia ɔkyɛn no ahoɔdzen no nsamu."

column2: "Na wɔbɛba abɔtow ndwom wɔ Zion sorɔnsorɔmbea
column3: na wɔapem akɔ EWURADZE ne yieyɛ ho
column4: eburow
column7: na hɔn nguan na anantwimba ho: na hɔn kra bɛyɛ dɛ ture a woegugu mu nsu; na worinndzi awerɛhow bio koraa."

column3: na mberantsɛ na nkɔdaa nyinara abɔ mu enyi agye: na mebɛdan hɔn nkɔmbɔdzi ahosɛpɛw
column4: na makyekye hɔn werɛ na mama woefi hɔn awerɛhow mu edzi ehurusi."

column2: "Na mebɛma angoanam amee asɔfo hɔn kra
column3: na me yieyɛ amee me man
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Wɔtse ndze bi nka wɔ Rama
column3: osukwadwom
column4: na osu wenwen
column5: Rakel rusu ne mba; na ɔmmpen dɛ wɔbɛkyekye no werɛ wɔ ne mba ntsi; osiandɛ wonnyi hɔ."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Sianka wo ndze wɔ osu ho
column3: na w’enyiwa wɔ nyinsuwa ho: na w’edwuma ho akatua wɔ hɔ
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse: na wobefi ɔtamfo no asaase do aba bio."

column3: EWURADZE na ɔse; na wo mba bɛsan aba hɔnankasa hɔn aman do bio."
matse Efraim no nkɔmbɔdzi dɛ
column4: Ɔwo atsea me na magye ntsea no
column5: meyɛɛ dɛ ɔnantwiba a ɔnnweaa kɔndua ho. Fa me san bra
column6: ma mensan mbra; na ɔwo nye EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn."

column3: munuu moho; na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ me no
column4: mutwaa m’aserɛ ho: m’enyi toe
column7: osiandɛ mosoaa me mberantsɛber mu enyimguase."

column2: "Aso Efraim yɛ me dɔba? Aso ɔyɛ ɔba a m’enyi gye no ho? Mpɛn dodow ara a mekasa tsia no no
column3: nkaa ara na meda ho mekaa no: dɛm ntsi mo nson mu burbur me wɔ no ho; mubohu no mbɔbɔr ampaara
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column3: sisi ɔkwankyerɛ edum ma woho: fa w’akoma si tsempɔn no no do
column4: ɔkwan a efaa mu no a. San bra
column6: san bra wo nkurow yi mu bio."

column3: ibedzi akɔnaaba ekodu dabɛn ara? Na EWURADZE abɔ adze fofor wɔ asaase do
column4: Ɔbaa botwitwa agye barimba."

column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: se nye yi: Wɔbɛda ho aka asɛm yi bio wɔ Juda asaase do na no nkurow mu
column5: ber a medze hɔn efi ndɔmmum asan aba no dɛ: Ao Pɛrpɛr tsenabea

column2: "Na Juda na no nkurow nyinara bɔbɔ mu atsena mu; ekuafo
column3: na hɔn a wɔnye mbowakuw kyinkyin."
na ɔkra werɛhofo biara mahyɛ no ma bio."
na mohwɛe; na me nda tɔɔ me dɛw mu."
nda reba a
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse
column6: na abowa n’asefo mubodua Israel fi na Juda fi."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ m’enyi asa hɔn do dɛ mubotutu na mebubu
column4: na mebutuw na masɛɛ
column5: na mehiahia ho no; dɛmara so na m’enyi bɔko hɔn ho dɛ mibesi na matsɛw

column2: "Nda no mu no wɔnnkɛka bio dɛ
column3: Egyanom atwɛr ebuntwirede yerɛyerɛw
column4: na mba hɔn se afemfem."

column2: "Na mbom obiara bowu wɔ nankasa n’emumuyɛ ntsi: nyimpa biara a obedzi ebuntwirede yerɛyerɛw no
column3: ɔnoara ne se na ɔbɛfem."
nda reba a
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse
column5: menye Israel fi na Juda fi bedzi ahyɛmu fofor:"

column2: "ɔnntse dɛ ahyɛmu a menye hɔn egyanom dzii wɔ da a musuoo hɔn nsamu no
column3: miyii hɔn Egypt asaase do no; m’ahyɛmu a wɔtoe
column4: naaso na emi dze meda ho meyɛ hɔn kun no

column2: "Na iyi nye ahyɛmu a menye Israel fi bedzi wɔ nda no ekyir
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse; medze me mbra bɛhyɛ hɔn mu
column4: na hɔn akoma mu na mebɛkyerɛw mu; na emi mebɛyɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn
column5: na hɔn so wɔayɛ me man:"

column3: na obiara nnkɛkyerɛ no nua bio dɛ
column4: Hu EWURADZE: na hɔn nyinara wobohu no
column5: ofi hɔn mu aketseaba do kesi hɔn mu kɛse do
column6: EWURADZE na ɔse: na medze hɔn emumuyɛ mebɛkyɛ hɔn
column7: na hɔn bɔn so merennkaa bio."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE a ɔma ewia hyerɛn adzekyee
column3: na ɔhyehyɛ bosoom na nworaba ma wɔhyerɛn anadwe
column4: onunu po mu ma n’asorɛkye hur
column5: a ne dzin dze dɔm EWURADZE no

column2: "Sɛ ahyehyɛdze yinom fi m’enyim fir a
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: ɔnodze na Israel asefo so begyaa dɛ wɔyɛ ɔman wɔ m’enyim daa nyina."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Sɛ wotum susu ɔsor wimu
column3: na wɔbɔr hwehwɛ asaase ne fapem wɔ n’ase noho a
column4: ɔnodze na mo so mobɔtow Israel asefo akyen wɔ dza wɔayɛ nyina ntsi

column3: nda reba a
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse
column6: efi Hananel abantsentsen ho ekodu nkyɛnmu ɔponkɛse no ho."

column2: "Na susuhoma no befi hɔ ara nam tsentsendo ekodu Gareb koko ho
column3: na oebu adan ekesi Goa."

column2: "Na efun na nso bɔnsa no nyina
column3: na mfuwa nyina a okodu ɔwora Kidron ho
column4: dze kodu pɔnkɔ ɔponkɛse no nkyɛn no wɔ boka afamu
